claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amazon Web Services  (  AWS  )  describes both a technology and a company .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company AWS is a subsidiary of Amazon.com and provides on-demand cloud computing platforms to both individuals , companies and governments , on a paid subscription basis with a free-tier option available for 12 months .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The technology allows subscribers to have at their disposal full-fledged virtual cluster of computers , available 24/7/365 , through the internet .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: AWS ' version of virtual computers have most of the attributes of a real computer including hardware  (  CPU  (  s  )  & GPU  (  s  )  for processing , local/RAM memory , hard-disk/SSD storage  )  ; a choice of operating systems ; networking ; and pre-loaded application software such as web servers , databases , CRM ... nearly anything .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Each AWS system also virtualizes its console I/O  (  keyboard , display , and mouse  )  , allowing AWS subscribers to connect to their AWS system using a modern browser .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The browser acts as a window into the virtual computer , letting subscribers log-in , configure and use their virtual systems just as they would a real physical computer .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: They can choose to deploy their AWS systems to provide internet-based services for their own and their customers ' benefit .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The AWS technology is implemented at server farms throughout the world , and maintained by the Amazon subsidiary .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fees are based on a combination of usage , the hardware/OS/software / networking features chosen by the subscriber , required availability , redundancy , security , and service options .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Based on what the subscriber needs and pays for , they can reserve a single virtual AWS computer , a cluster of virtual computers , a physical  (  real  )  computer dedicated for their exclusive use , or even a cluster of dedicated physical computers .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As part of the subscription agreement , Amazon manages , upgrades , and provides industry-standard security to each subscriber 's system .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: AWS services operate from many global geographical regions including 6 in North America .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2016 , AWS comprised more than 70 services spanning a wide range including compute , storage , networking , database , analytics , application services , deployment , management , mobile , developer tools , and tools for the Internet of Things .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The most popular include Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud  (  aka `` EC2 ''  )  and Amazon Simple Storage Service  (  aka `` S3 ''  )  .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Most services are not exposed directly to end users , but instead offer functionality through APIs for developers to use in their applications .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amazon Web Services ' offerings are accessed over HTTP , using the REST architectural style and SOAP protocol .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amazon markets AWS to subscribers as a way of obtaining large scale computing capacity more quickly and cheaply than building an actual physical server farm .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: All services are billed based on usage , but each service measures usage in varying ways .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2016 , AWS comprised more than 70 services spanning a wide range including compute , storage , networking , database , analytics , application services , deployment , management , mobile , developer tools , and tools for the Internet of Things .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is used as a web service in concert with Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud  (  EC2  )  and Amazon S3 and is part of Amazon Web Services .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amazon S3  (  Simple Storage Service  )  is a web service offered by Amazon Web Services .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Before being appointed CEO in February 2009 , he led Zend 's R&D including development of all Zend products and Zend 's contributions to the open-source Zend Framework and PHP Development Tools projects .

claim: Amazon Web Services featured tools for mobility.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his role at Amazon Web Services , Gutmans manages in-memory databases , including Amazon ElastiCache for memcached and redis .
